map.name: Nyxis
map.objective: Obtain the enemy's wool and return it to one of your spawn monuments!

broadcasts.alert: You can buy upgrades at the shops with emeralds, earned from mining, kills and the middle spawner!
broadcasts.tip: You can buy upgrades at the shops with emeralds, earned from mining, kills, and the middle spawner!

item.lore: `eCan also be purchased at the witch shop!

item.name: `6`lHunger, Begone!
item.lore: Erases the need for food|for all players on your team.

item.name: `c`lLifespan Extension
item.lore: Adds `b`otwo `5`oadditional hearts|to all players on your team.

item.name: `e`lLifespan Extension+
item.lore: Adds `b`otwo `5`oadditional hearts|to all players on your team.

item.name: `6`lLifespan Extension++
item.lore: Adds `b`oone `5`oadditional heart|to all players on your team.

item.name: `d`lRushing Rhapsody
item.lore: Increases the speed of all players|on your team.

item.name: `3`lDigging Swiftness
item.lore: Gives haste to all players on|your team.

item.name: `b`lMoonlit Elixir
item.lore: Turn night into day with a sip!

item.name: `c`lMild Vitality Vial
item.lore: Instant health boost.|When life gets rough.

item.name: `c`lStrong Vitality Vial
item.lore: Instant health boost.|When life gets really rough.

item.name: `a`lLeap Tonic
item.lore: Take a swig and you'll be hopping|over your enemies!

item.lore: Creates a dense fog that briefly|blinds and confuses your enemies.
